webScraper.title: Advanced Web Scraper
webScraper.description: Automated scraping system for web data extraction with Node.js, Puppeteer and SQL Server. Includes React web interface for product management.

portfolio.title: Full Stack Portfolio
portfolio.description: Professional portfolio with Next.js on the frontend and Express.js + MongoDB on the backend. Includes functional contact form and interactive chatbot.

ocr.title: OCR Marcación
ocr.description: Intelligent optical character recognition system with multiple preprocessing strategies. Uses Tesseract and EasyOCR to extract text from labels with high precision.

responses.webscraper: 🕷️ Automated scraping system with Node.js, Puppeteer and SQL Server. Extracts data from multiple websites with React interface for management.
responses.portfolio: 💼 Professional portfolio with Next.js, Express.js and MongoDB. Includes functional contact form and interactive chatbot.
responses.ocr: 🔍 Intelligent OCR system with Python, Flask and OpenCV. Multiple preprocessing strategies for high accuracy in text extraction.
responses.frontend: ⚛️ Specialized in React, Next.js, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS to create modern, responsive and high-performance interfaces.
responses.backend: 🖥️ Expert in Node.js, Express.js and scalable architectures. Focused on REST APIs, security and performance optimization.
responses.database: 🗄️ Working with MongoDB, PostgreSQL and SQL Server. Efficient schema design and query optimization for maximum performance.
responses.python: 🐍 Development with Python, Flask and AI/ML libraries like OpenCV, Tesseract and EasyOCR for computer vision projects.
responses.viewProjects: Perfect! Taking you to the projects section 🚀
responses.viewTechnologies: Excellent! Showing you all my technical skills 💪
responses.helpMore: What else can I help you with?
